name: dragon-scale
effect: Held by Seadra: Evolves the holder into Kingdra when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Seadra: Holder evolves into Kingdra.

flavor_text.black-white: A thick and tough scale. Dragon-type Pokémon may be holding this item when caught.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A thick and tough scale. Dragon-type Pokémon may be holding this item when caught.
